mapper.insert: insert into FcubeSponsor (idx, cubeuuid, uid, comment, sendTime, pointType, pointValue) values (#{idx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cubeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pointType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pointValue,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update FcubeSponsor set cubeuuid = #{cubeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sendTime = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pointType = #{pointType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pointValue = #{pointValue,jdbcType=INTEGER} where idx = #{idx,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select idx, cubeuuid, uid, comment, sendTime, pointType, pointValue from FcubeSponsor
SELECT IFNULL((SUM(pointValue)),0) as pointValue FROM FcubeSponsor WHERE cubeuuid = #{cubeuuid}
SELECT COUNT(A.uid) AS SponsorCount FROM ( SELECT uid FROM FcubeSponsor WHERE cubeuuid = #{cubeuuid} GROUP BY uid ) A
